sen.j: 猿丸神社（さるまるじんじゃ）は、京都府綴喜郡宇治田原町にある神社である。
sen.e: Sarumaru-jinja Shrine is located in Ujitawara-cho, Tsuzuki-gun of Kyoto Prefecture.
Sarumaru-jinja Shrine is located in Ujitawara-cho, Tsuzuki-gun of Kyoto Prefecture.
Sarumaru-jinja Shrine is located in Ujitawara-cho, Tsuzuki-gun of Kyoto Prefecture.
This shrine was ranked as Mukaku-sha (an ungraded shrine) in the old shrine classification system.
sen.cmt: 用語集には"a shrine with no shrine ranking in the old shrine classification system"とありましたが、左を採用しました。
sen.e: This shrine was ranked as Mukaku-sha (an ungraded shrine) in the old shrine classification system.
This shrine was ranked as Mukaku-sha (an ungraded shrine) in the old shrine classification system.

sen.j: この神社の創建年代等については不詳であるが、1645年（正保2年）に社殿が再建されたと伝えられる。
sen.e: It is unknown when this shrine was founded, but according to a legend, the main building was rebuilted in 1645.
It is unknown when this shrine was founded, but according to legend, the main building was rebuilt in 1645.
It is unknown when this shrine was founded, but according to legend, the main building was rebuilt in 1645.

sen.j: 京都府綴喜郡宇治田原町禅定寺粽谷44

sen.cmt: 用語集には"festival day"もありましたが、fairを採用。
